dcterms:description: A dataset of global glacier outlines, serving as a baseline dataset for modellers, but with limited temporal coverage as most glacier outlines were mapped around the year 2000.
dcterms:title: Global Randolph Glacier Inventory (RGI)

dcterms:description: The largest inventory database of glaciers, which is a compilation of regional inventories with varying levels of accuracy and consistency.
dcterms:title: GLIMS Glacier Database

dcterms:creator: F. Paul
S. H. Winsvold
A. Kääb
T. Nagler
G. Schwaizer
dcterms:description: A new glacier inventory from Sentinel-2 that reveals continued glacier shrinkage in the Alps.
dcterms:title: Regional inventories for glacier outlines in the Alps

dcterms:creator: J. L. Carrivick
W. H. James
M. Grimes
J. L. Sutherland
A. M. Lorrey
dcterms:description: A study on ice thickness and volume changes across the Southern Alps, New Zealand, from the Little Ice Age to present.
dcterms:title: Regional inventories for glacier outlines in New Zealand

dcterms:creator: A. Lith
G. Moholdt
J. Kohler
dcterms:description: A glacier inventory based on Sentinel-2 imagery from summer 2020 in Svalbard.
dcterms:title: Regional inventories for glacier outlines in Svalbard

dcterms:description: Reference data for remaining regions in the GLIMS Glacier Database.
dcterms:title: GLIMS reference data for remaining regions
